definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly

sentences.english: The company formulates the brand development strategies with practical and prospective features.
sentences.chinese: 公司制定了具有現實意義和前瞻性的品牌發展戰略。

sentences.english: The ecological city construction values compensation, lacks foresightedness.
sentences.chinese: 生態城市建設重補償，缺乏前瞻性。

sentences.english: Smart, successful and good-looking Iwaya Sumire works for a big newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 聰明，成功和良好的前瞻性巖屋堇工程大報紙。

sentences.english: METHODS: Some 186 patients were studied prospectively .
sentences.chinese: 對186名患者進行前瞻性研究。

sentences.english: I'm not that far ahead yet.
sentences.chinese: 我還不具有這樣的前瞻性。

sentences.english: Ancelotti's full preview of the game will appear here shortly.
sentences.chinese: 安切洛蒂的完整版比賽前瞻會很快放出。

sentences.english: Small white speckled or powdery-looking patches appear on the surface of the nail plate .
sentences.chinese: 白色的小斑點或粉狀前瞻性補丁出現在釘板表面。

sentences.english: Therefore, our perspective future, knowledge is infinite, achievement foresight.
sentences.chinese: 於是，我們前瞻未來，學無止境，成就遠見。

sentences.english: Are you expected to proactively diagnose performance and availability problems?
sentences.chinese: 您是否需要前瞻性地診斷性能和可用性問題？

sentences.english: Prospective studies have variably adjusted for relevant confounders and have been of relatively limited duration.
sentences.chinese: 前瞻性研究調整了相關混雜性設計和限制了持續時間。

sentences.english: Stroke patients were then followed prospectively to assess recurrent stroke and death.
sentences.chinese: 並前瞻性的隨訪卒中患者，評估再發卒中和死亡。

sentences.english: It only takes practice and a slight change in perspective.
sentences.chinese: 這隻需要一些練習和一些獲得前瞻的機會。

sentences.english: They are proactive and consider seriously the results they achieve.
sentences.chinese: 他們具有前瞻性，並且會仔細斟酌所得的成果。

sentences.english: The development must have foresightedness , the accurate foresight can guide the economy to go out the difficult position.
sentences.chinese: 發展要有前瞻性，準確預見才能引導經濟走出困境。

sentences.english: Methods A prospective case-controlled study was adopted.
sentences.chinese: 方法採用前瞻性病例對照研究。

sentences.english: Did you Eva see such a sweaty-looking superstar?
sentences.chinese: 你伊娃看到這樣一個滿身是汗的前瞻性巨星了嗎？

definition: best of the best/collection of the best (of sth)
outlook/prospect/to look ahead/to look forward to
to sum up/a roundup/a general narrative
specific topic (addressed by a book, lecture, TV program etc)/article, report or program etc on a specific topic
whether or not/can it or can't it/is it possible?
lit. to wipe one's eyes and wait (idiom); to wait and see
